Package com.comp2042.data

package com.comp2042.data
This package contains classes that stores the data of the Tetris game.

This package includes:

  • ClearRow – stores the information on the cleared rows/li>
  • DownData – store the result of when a piece moves down
  • Level – manages the current game level.
  • LinesCleared – tracks the total number of lines cleared.
  • MoveEvent – stores the event source and event type.
  • NextShapeInfo – stores information about the next Tetris piece.
  • SaveData – handles user's settings and progress data.
  • Score – keeps track of the current score.
  • SoundData – manages game's sound effects.

Classes in this package are typically accessed by controllers and views to read or update the game state and synchronize the UI with the game logic.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.comp2042

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClearRow
    This class represents the result of clearing the rows in the game matrix.
    DownData
    This class represents the result of a downward movement of a brick.
    Level
    Tracks the player's level and handles level progression logic during the game.
    LinesCleared
    Tracks the total number of lines cleared by the player during a game.
    MoveEvent
    This class represents a movement event triggered either by the user or the system.
    NextShapeInfo
    This class represents the information about the next brick shape.
    SaveData
    The SaveData class manages reading and writing the game settings and player saved data to a text file.
    Score
    Tracks the player's current score and handles automatic saving of high scores.
    SoundData
    Represents an individual sound configuration consisting of a file name and volume.
